name: Louis Philippe shirt
description: Classic Louis Philippe shirt crafted with premium cotton for a soft and breathable feel.

name: Tommy Hilfiger shirt
description: Designed for comfort and style, it features a sleek button-down front, embroidered TH logo, and a modern slim fit, making it perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Nike Unisex Hoodie
description: Stay warm and stylish with this Nike pullover hoodie. Designed with soft fleece fabric, adjustable drawstrings, and a kangaroo pocket.

name: Levi's Denim Jeans
description: Original Levi's slim-fit jeans made with durable denim. Offers a timeless look with stretchable comfort, perfect for everyday wear.

name: Puma Shoes
description: High-performance Puma running shoes designed for speed and comfort.

name: Pantaloons Men's Formal
description: Stylish and comfortable formal pants from Pantaloons, crafted with premium poly-viscose blend fabric. Perfect for office wear or formal events.

name: Allen Solly Polo T-shirt
description: Casual yet classy polo T-shirt by Allen Solly, made with rich cotton fabric and featuring a subtle logo embroidery. Ideal for weekend outings.

name: Roadster Leather Jacket
description: A rugged leather jacket from Roadster designed for style and durability. Features zip closures and a stand collar for a bold look.

name: HRX Training Shorts
description: Lightweight and breathable training shorts by HRX. Perfect for workouts and running, with moisture-wicking fabric and an adjustable waistband.

name: Raymond Men's Blazer
description: Tailored Raymond blazer that adds a touch of sophistication to your formal ensemble. Designed with a structured fit and classic detailing.
